item.title: Download original template
item.description: A simple, nice-looking call to action box. Boxing is about respect. getting it for yourself, and taking it away from the other guy. no, this is mount everest.

item.title: About
item.description: Geek. Technology evangelist. Curious researcher. Passionate for learning, teaching and enhancing user experience through a storytelling. Work experience I have been in Documentation since 2011. Started as a junior researcher in All-Russian Research Institute of Civil Defence and Emergencies (VNII GOChS for short). I had my postgraduate studies and after obtaining a PhD degree I had a chance to start a new department from scratch. In 2019 I got recruited by VK (Mail.

My passion is Information Technology. I find it most interesting to learn new technologies and design documents. You can learn more about my Education, Work experience or read a Summary. Also there is a Portfolio section you might wanna check.

item.title: Analytics
item.description: I am efficient in learning new technologies and processing vast amounts of data. Have a lot of experience with structuring, formalising and simplifying information.

item.title: Documentation engineering
item.description: With my years of experience in software engineering and technical communication I can solve most problems with documentation.

item.title: Passion
item.description: My deepest passion in learning new technologies, products, user experiences. I am eager to learn, whether it’s new framework, new hardware architecture or new web-interface.

item.title: Team Leadership
item.description: I had two chances to lead a team in my life. And both times I have created from scratch cross-functional teams of highly-skilled professionals that I can be proud of.
